item.description:
♥♥THURSDAY April 4 -CT Match.com SPEED Match Dating Ages 18-39 & Ages 40 and Up

2 Separate Events with 2 Age Groups in 2 Different Rooms

AGES 19-39 and AGES 40 and Up

-Registration starts at 6:30pm - Air Museum mini tour starts at 6:45pm

SPEED Match Dating Events start at 7pm AFTERPARTY follows event

MEET UP TO 20 SINGLES LOOKING FOR A MATCH IN ONE EXCITING EVENING - and more people at the Afterparty!

PLUS - Every SPEED Match Dater receives a FREE pass to
visit the New England Air Museum ($12 value)

“ Speed Dating is a very inexpensive, efficient and fun way to meet other local singles and go on dates with the people that you want to date”

MEET SOMEONE SPECIAL AND PARTY WITH CTMatch.com

New England Air Museum
36 Perimeter Road
at Bradley International Airport
Windsor Locks, CT 06096


At The New England Air Museum, you will find over 80 aircraft on display in our three large exhibit hangars and outdoor display area, as well as innumerable related artifacts, hands-on activities, demonstrations, multimedia experiences, special exhibits and flight simulators - History comes to life at New England's Largest Air Museum

All your information is confidential - your Matches will be emailed to you -exchanging email addresses only - for your privacy and safety.

CTMatch.com SPEED Match Dating is the only Speed Dating Event to double-verify your Speed Dating Matches professionally. We do this to ensure the accuracy of your Matches and to make sure that you receive the all your correct matches - and that you don't receive unwanted false matches.

Your matches are professional calculated and reviewed AFTER the event, and then emailed to you within a few days to guarantee accuracy, confidentiality, and privacy.

SEATING IS LIMITED – RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

Tickets are $40 at the event

ADVANCE DISCOUNT TICKETS ARE $30
at http://www.CTMatch.com or call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the CTMatch.com signs - we will be in the rooms on the left across from gift shop

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
